message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $15000. Considering its value and rarity, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $17000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $16000 for it. Would this be possible?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another counteroffer. Considering the value and rarity of the product, I'm willing to sell it to you for $16500. This is a compromise, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you think?

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $16000 for the product. I hope this offer will be acceptable.

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $16000. Considering the product's value and rarity, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $16200. This is my final compromise. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay up to $16000 for the product. I hope this offer meets your expectations.

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $16000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $16100. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $16000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your final price point.
